entities.description: The act of selling illegal drugs by an individual within the past 12 months.
The act of stealing or attempting to steal anything worth more than $50 by an individual within the past 12 months.
The act of attacking someone with the intent to seriously hurt them by an individual within the past 12 months.
Number of times specific actions related to crime or violence have been committed in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of times the respondent has sold illegal drugs in the past 12 months.
Indicates the number of times the respondent has stolen or attempted to steal anything worth more than $50 in the past 12 months.
Indicates the number of times the respondent has attacked someone with the intent to seriously hurt them in the past 12 months.
